SELECT * FROM sg_user as su WHERE 1=1
and su.login_name like CONCAT('%','${model.loginName}','%' )
and su.user_name like CONCAT('%','${model.userName}','%' )
and is_dummy = ${model.dummy}
and (is_dummy is null or is_dummy = '' or is_dummy = false)

SELECT count(id) AS count FROM ( SELECT st.id FROM sg_law_comment st WHERE st.from_user_id = #{userId} AND st.reply_user_id IS NOT NULL AND st.reply_content IS NOT NULL AND st.is_read IS NULL AND st.state = 'pass' UNION ALL SELECT sa.id FROM sg_ask sa JOIN sg_law_comment sc ON sa.id = sc.topic_id WHERE sa.user_id = #{userId} AND is_read IS NULL ) a

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT st.topic_type as type, st.topic_id as topicId, st.id, su.user_name AS replyName, su.head_img AS headImg, st.create_date AS createDate, st.content as fromContent, st.reply_content as replyContent FROM sg_law_comment st JOIN sys_user su ON st.reply_user_id = su.id WHERE st.from_user_id = #{userId} AND st.reply_user_id IS NOT NULL AND st.reply_content IS NOT NULL AND st.is_read IS NULL AND st.state = 'pass' UNION ALL SELECT sc.topic_type as type, sc.topic_id as topicId, sa.id, sr.user_name AS replyName, sr.head_img AS headImg, sc.create_date AS createDate, sa.content as fromContent, sc.reply_content as replyContent FROM sg_ask sa JOIN sg_law_comment sc ON sa.id = sc.topic_id JOIN sys_user sr ON sc.reply_user_id = sr.id WHERE sa.user_id = #{userId} AND is_read IS NULL ) a
